ActCorrections and Conditional Release Act
PrecisReappointment of PATRICIA LYNN PITSULA of Abbotsford, British Columbia, to be a full-time member of the Parole Board of Canada to hold office during good behaviour for a period of five years, effective February 23, 2014; and designate PATRICIA LYNN PITSULA to be a full-time member of the Appeal Division of the Parole Board of Canada, effective July 8, 2013.
